clean_age[source]

clean_age(df:DataFrame)

clean age

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
train.age.describe()

count    100000.000000
mean         40.123920
std          17.299295
min          -1.000000
25%          24.000000
50%          39.000000
75%          50.000000
max         116.000000
Name: age, dtype: float64
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df1 = clean_age(train)
assert df1.age.min() >= 18
assert df1.age.max() <= 100

print("#### before ####")
print(train.age.describe())

print("#### after ####")
print(df1.age.describe())
#del df1

clean_renta

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

clean_renta[source]

clean_renta(df:DataFrame)

fill in NaNs with median value from its region

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df1 = clean_renta(train)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert df1.renta.min() > 0

print("#### before ####")
print(train.renta.describe())

print("#### after ####")
print(df1.renta.describe())

del df1

#### before ####
count    1.000000e+05
mean     1.067759e+05
std      2.371295e+05
min     -1.000000e+00
25%      4.121675e+04
50%      8.322900e+04
75%      1.369455e+05
max      2.889440e+07
Name: renta, dtype: float64
#### after ####
count    7.944200e+04
mean     1.344076e+05
std      2.589748e+05
min      4.559000e+03
25%      6.846575e+04
50%      1.014830e+05
75%      1.559040e+05
max      2.889440e+07

clean_all_data[source]

clean_all_data(source:"source csv file"='data/interim/01_train.csv', dest:"destination csv file"='data/interim/02_train.csv')

main function to clean all data

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
train = clean_all_data()
